name: Shadow Thing
description: A being of pure darkness and terror that can meld with shadows and shatter minds. Its very presence erodes the sanity of enemies.

abilities.name: Fear Aura
abilities.description: Emanates terror that weakens nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Shadow Meld
abilities.description: Becomes invisible and gains bonus damage.

abilities.name: Mind Shatter
abilities.description: Attacks enemy minds based on fear stacks.

abilities.name: Nightmare Walk
abilities.description: Teleports and fears all at destination.
